<h1 align="center">
  VTEX Careers on steroids
</h1>

It's a Gatsby project using TailwindCSS and sourcing from Wordpress.

Documentation about this site is [here](https://www.notion.so/vtexhandbook/Automations-and-Systems-47b6c97719274b6da928b43b9af3808f?p=2b78c35c6244405fb4fb7a8d032a7ba1)

To develop it just run: `yarn && gatsby start`
